mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WISHLIST( WISHLIST_ID, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, CONTENT_ID, CREATED_AT ) VALUES( WISHLIST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{contentType}, #{contentId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT w.wishlist_id, w.member_id, CASE w.content_type WHEN 32 THEN 'HOUSE' WHEN 15 THEN 'CAR' ELSE 'UNKNOWN' END AS contentType, w.content_id, r.room_id, r.room_name AS title, r.description, r.image1 AS imageUrl, r.price, r.room_size, r.minimum_capacity, r.maximum_capacity FROM wishlist w LEFT JOIN house_room_info r ON w.content_type = 32 AND w.content_id = r.house_id LEFT JOIN car c ON w.content_type = 15 AND w.content_id = c.car_id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId}
